Text: I've been looking for this for a while. Well I found it. Enjoy!
I DL'D THIS IN HOPES IT WAS A FIGHT.  ITS JOE ROGAN THE UFC AND ALL THAT OTHER SHIT.  HE IS FUNNY AS SHIT!!! I COULDNT BELIEVE HOW FUNNY HE IS!!!  definately worth it!!!
I keep listening and I find he is a genius!!!!
Joe Rogan is a bad motherfucker. I can't remember the last time I laughed so hard!

Thanks for the upload! I would have uploaded this myself but my friend has had my Shiny Happy Jihad CD since a week after I bought it back in the summer! I am impressed by the evolution of Joe's comedy! I hope he doesn't get lazy and puts out another album real soon.

If you liked this check out "Talking Monkeys in Space" his most recent comedy routine which I found halarious.

Haven't watched this disc yet but I am a Rogan fan (watch his podcast, watch old comedy footage of him) and he had some funny crap on the Talking Monkeys disc.

Just a headsup.
